original: NOKDENSTEN, Einar August, Bergsingenjör, Arboga, f Striberg, Nora bergsförs, 16/9> 75 av dir A Larson o Amalia Wahlström, gm Karolina Månson. Studex Karol Ivkt Örebro» 95, KTH o Bergshögsk (avd bergsmek) 99-Byggn.ing v Stribergs o Dalkarlsbergs gruvor 99—01, d:o o gruving AB Gällivare Malmfält 01—06, d:o A/S Sydvaranger, Norge, 06—13^ övering o konstr.ch AB Arboga Mek Verkst 1$ —42, projektingenjör sed. 42. Styr.ordf Arboga stads elverk 8 år, ordf Gällivare-Malmbergets; Musiksällsk o Arboga Jaktklubb min. Resor: Norge, Finl, Danm, Tyskl, Belg, Schweiz, Ital,. Engl, USA (2 ggr). Av trycket: »Åsbobergs anrikningsverk» (08), »Sydvarangers järn-malmfält» (14). Hobbies: Resor (helst pr motorcykel), botanik, jakt, musik.
translated: NOKDENSTEN, Einar August, Mining Engineer, Arboga, born in Striberg, Nora bergsförs, on September 16th, 1875, son of director A Larson and Amalia Wahlström, married to Karolina Månson. Studied at Karolinska Institute of Technology in Örebro in 1895, and at the Royal Institute of Technology and Mining College (department of mining engineering) in 1899. Construction engineer at Stribergs and Dalkarlsbergs mines from 1899 to 1901, as well as in the mining AB Gällivare Malmfält from 1901 to 1906, and in the A/S Sydvaranger in Norway from 1906 to 1913. Overseeing and construction engineer at AB Arboga Mek Verkst from 1913 to 1942, and project engineer since 1942. Chairman of the Arboga City Power Plant for 8 years, and chairman of the Gällivare-Malmbergets Music Society and Arboga Hunting Club. Travels to Norway, Finland, Denmark, Germany, Belgium, Switzerland, Italy, England, and the USA (twice). Published works include "Åsbobergs Ore Enrichment Plant" (1908) and "Sydvaranger's Iron Ore Fields" (1914). Hobbies include traveling (especially by motorcycle), botany, hunting, and music.

structured.name: Einar August Nokdensten
structured.description: Mining engineer and construction engineer known for his work in various mining companies and as a project engineer.

alumniOf.name: Royal Institute of Technology and Mining College
